entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending overnight then partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 16 in the evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 25 February 2023
